page.title: 05MIDDLETON PEOPLE AT WORK
page.content: {A DAD:}I work in a roofing factory, I start at 8.30am finish after 5pm. Each day is different: Estimating, surveying , ordering, drawing and corresponding. Lunch 1-2. I was 18 months unemployed. I thought I'd never work again. {A MUM:}Middleton hasn't enough work, I must travel:6.30am Family Breakfast 7.45 Take kids to minder-8.45 Start work as overlocking machinist. 5.15pm Finish, collect kids, make tea, housework, T.V. Two names that mean big industry to local people are British Vita (Foam pillows) and R.McBride,(Washing up liquid). {A CASUAL LABOURER}: At British Vita I was faced with a mountain of pillows and load them on to a conveyor belt, for 9 hot & stuffy Hrs. 40 mins lunch, boring work, clock in & out on time!
